nl.knaw.dans.rs.aggregator.xml

Enum Capability

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Capability>
      • nl.knaw.dans.rs.aggregator.xml.Capability
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Capability>

    public enum Capability
extends Enum<Capability>
    A mandatory attribute in all ResourceSync documents.

    Defined values are resourcelist, changelist, resourcedump, changedump, resourcedump-manifest, changedump-manifest, capabilitylist, and description.

    See Also:
    http://www.openarchives.org/rs/1.1/resourcesync#DocumentFormats

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CAPABILITYLIST
      A Capability List is a document that enumerates all capabilities supported by a Source for a specific set of resources.
      CHANGEDUMP
      A Change Dump is a document that points to packages containing bitstreams for the Source's changed resources.
      CHANGEDUMP_MANIFEST
      Each ZIP package referred to from a Change Dump must contain a Change Dump Manifest file that describes the constituent bitstreams of the package.
      CHANGELIST
      A Change List is a document that contains a description of changes to a Source's resources.
      DESCRIPTION
      A Source Description is a mandatory document that enumerates the Capability Lists offered by a Source.
      RESOURCEDUMP
      A Source may publish a Resource Dump, which provides links to packages of the resources' bitstreams.
      RESOURCEDUMP_MANIFEST
      Each ZIP package referred to from a Resource Dump must contain a Resource Dump Manifest file that describes the package's constituent bitstreams.
      RESOURCELIST
      A Resource List is introduced to list and describe the resources that a Source makes available for synchronization.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int level
      The level of the Capability.
      String xmlValue
      The value as present in xml on the element rs:md on the attribute capability.

      • DESCRIPTION

        public static final Capability DESCRIPTION
        A Source Description is a mandatory document that enumerates the Capability Lists offered by a Source.

      • CAPABILITYLIST

        A Capability List is a document that enumerates all capabilities supported by a Source for a specific set of resources.

      • RESOURCELIST

        A Resource List is introduced to list and describe the resources that a Source makes available for synchronization.

      • RESOURCEDUMP

        public static final Capability RESOURCEDUMP

      • RESOURCEDUMP_MANIFEST

        public static final Capability RESOURCEDUMP_MANIFEST

    • Field Detail

      • xmlValue

        public final String xmlValue
        The value as present in xml on the element rs:md on the attribute capability.

      • level

        public final int level
        The level of the Capability. The hierarchy of sitemap documents has 4 levels, with description as the highest level (3) and the resourcedump-manifest and changedump-manifest at the lowest level (0).

      • forString

        public static Capability forString(String xmlValue)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Get the Capability corresponding to the given xmlValue.
        Parameters:
        xmlValue - String as present in xml
        Returns:
        the corresponding Capability
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given string does not correspond to any Capability

      • levelfor

        public static int levelfor(String xmlValue)
        Get the level of the Capability corresponding to the given xmlValue. The hierarchy of sitemap documents has 4 levels, with description as the highest level (3) and resourcedump-manifest and changedump-manifest at the lowest level (0).
        Parameters:
        xmlValue - String as present in xml
        Returns:
        the level of the Capability or -1 if the given string does not correspond to any Capability

      • getXmlValue

        public String getXmlValue()
        Get the xmlValue of this Capability.
        Returns:

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Get the level of this Capability.
        Returns:
        the level of this Capability

      • getUpRelation

        public Capability getUpRelation()
        The capability of a parent document expressed with a link with relation type 'up'. Except for documents with capability 'description' such a link is mandatory.
        Returns:
        the capability of a parent document with relation type 'up', or null if such a relation does not exist.

      • getIndexRelation

        public Capability getIndexRelation()
        The capability of a parent document expressed with a link with relation type 'index'.
        Returns:
        the capability of a parent document with relation type 'index', or null if such a relation does not exist.

      • getChildRelations

        public Capability[] getChildRelations()
        The capability of possible child documents as expressed in the <loc> element of <url> and <sitemap>.
        Returns:
        Array of Capabilities of possible child documents.

      • getChildRelationsXmlValues

        public String[] getChildRelationsXmlValues()
        The xmlValues of possible child documents as expressed in the <loc> element of <url> and <sitemap>.
        Returns:
        Array of xmlValues of possible child documents
        See Also:
        getChildRelations()

      • verifyUpRelation

        public boolean verifyUpRelation(Capability relation)
        Verify that the given Capability is a valid value for the up relation in a document of this Capability.
        Parameters:
        relation - the Capability to test
        Returns:
        true if the up relation is valid, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getUpRelation()

        Returns:
